skills.title: HTML
skills.description: My experience with HTML was great. I know how to use HTML efficiently and effectively.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: I enjoyed my experience with CSS. I know all about styling the page and how to make animations using CSS only.

skills.title: BOOTSTRAP
skills.description: My experience with Bootstrap was fun. Being introduced to columns, rows, and containers changed everything for me. It allowed me to work way faster than I did before.

skills.title: JAVASCRIPT
skills.description: Going into Javascript I did not know what to expect, but as I carried on learning it opened my world to many more ideas and ways to add functionality to my page.

skills.title: VUEJS
skills.description: Just as I thought Javascript was mind-blowing, Vue.js appeared and blew my mind even further. With the use of components and the store, it made everything even easier than it was before.

education.title: Life Choices Academy
education.description: I finished a 6-month Full Stack Web Development Course at Life Choices Academy and achieved a certificate.

education.title: Rylands High School
education.description: I attended Rylands High School and passed with a Bachelors Pass.

experience.title: Life Choices Studio
experience.description: I am currently an intern at Life Choices Studio

projects.Title: Surpass Fitness
projects.Description: I have built and deployed an E-commerce website called Surpass Fitness using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Javascript, VueJS, NodeJS, and MySQL.

projects.Title: Point of Sale System
projects.Description: I have built and deployed a POS (Point of Sale) System using HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, and JavaScript ES6.

projects.Title: BMI Calculator
projects.Description: I have built and deployed a BMI (Body, Mass, Index) calculator using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ES6.

projects.Title: Calculator
projects.Description: I have built and deployed a calculator using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ES6.

projects.Title: First Portfolio
projects.Description: I have built and deployed my first portfolio website using HTML5, CSS3, and BOOTSTRAP.

projects.Title: Land Of Code Of Programming
projects.Description: I have built and deployed a replica of a website called Land Of Code Programming using HTML5, CSS3.

testimonials.Name: Imraan Bernksen
testimonials.Content: I highly recommend Rayhaan Khan, an aspiring web developer with a passion for creating stunning and functional websites. Rayhaan has a strong foundation in programming languages such as HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap and is constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies. Their attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work make them an excellent choice for any web development project.

testimonials.Name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.Content: Rayhaan is a hard worker. He's a very focused and quiet person but if you need him to do anything or even help with anything he's always willing to. He's always punctual when it comes to tasks, Rayhaan is one person you'll never have to wait on for anything. He does things to the best of his ability and will put in extra to just make sure that what he does is up to your standards. Rayhaan is very motivated and eager to learn more. He is definitely someone you'd want on your team.

testimonials.Name: Nuraan Samodien
testimonials.Content: Rayhaan is a highly thought intellectual from my perspective. He is passionate, ambitious, hardworking, and always provides a helping hand to anyone who needs it. He has great communication and leadership skills and any company would be lucky to have him on their team.

testimonials.Name: Ganiefah Majiet
testimonials.Content: Rayhaan is someone who I would definitely recommend. He's always positive and willing to help the next person although he's busy himself, he's intelligent and very hardworking. He is always positive and he always provides everyone with help and motivation.

testimonials.Name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
testimonials.Content: Rayhaan is a very intuitive and intelligent person. I've learned so much from him. He's very assertive and knows what's right and wrong. His motivation is also unmatched and he is very good at what he does. He's honestly one of the smartest people I know and I would recommend him because he is very good at what he does.

testimonials.Name: Justin Scholtz
testimonials.Content: Rayhaan Khan is truly inspiring, with an unwavering commitment to their goals and an exceptional work ethic. They have a huge passion for technology and a remarkable ability to connect with others in any environment. Rayhaan's acts of kindness and genuine care for others demonstrate their exceptional character. They consistently go above and beyond, leaving a positive and lasting impact on everyone they encounter.
